name: Семён
info:
• 简体中文名: 谢米扬
  • 别名: 谢苗
  • 别名: Semyon
  • 性别: 男
detail: Semyon, a male of age 25 in the opening but regressed to 18 during most of the game, is the protagonist of the game. He is portrayed as having brown hair. He describes himself as being nothing special and a person you could easily miss on the street. He attended the university but quit after half a year, and then continued doing odd jobs for a living. He also once used to be able to play the guitar and his programming skills were told to be above average.
